#include<iostream>
#define MAX 100
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,n,i,j,row,rows,col,cols,sum;
    int *p[MAX];
    cin >> t;
    while(t--)
    {
         j=0;sum=0;row=0;col=0;rows=0;cols=0;
         cin >> n;
         for(i=0;i<n;i++)
            p[i] = new int[n];
         for(i=0;i<n;i++)
         {
             for(j=0;j<n;j++)
             {
                 cin >> p[i][j];
                 sum += p[i][j];
             }
             if(sum % 2 != 0)
             {
                row = i;
                rows++;
             }
             sum=0;
         }
         if(rows>1)
         {
             cout << 0 << endl;
             for(i=0;i<n;i++)
                 delete []p[i];
             continue;
         }
         sum=0;
         for(i=0;i<n;i++)
         {
             for(j=0;j<n;j++)
             {
                 sum += p[j][i];
             }
             if(sum % 2 != 0)
             {
                col = i;
                cols++;
             }
             sum = 0;
         }
         if(cols>1)
         {
             cout << 0 << endl;
             for(i=0;i<n;i++)
                 delete []p[i];
             continue;
         }
         if(rows == 0 && cols == 0)
         {
         cout << 1 << endl;
         for(i=0;i<n;i++)
             delete []p[i];
         continue;
         }
         cout << "(" << row + 1 << "," << col + 1 << ")" << endl;
         for(i=0;i<n;i++)
             delete []p[i];
    }
    //system("pause");
    return 0;
}
